system.description: When you touch someone and attempt to read their surface thoughts, roll with SPIRIT.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, you inflict 1-harm (ap) on them and yourself.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, ask their player questions from the list below.

On a 7-9, ask 1:

  • what are you thinking about right now?
  • who or what are you protecting?
  • what secrets are you currently keeping?
  • what is your hidden pain?

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, ask their player questions from the list below.

On a 10+, ask 3:

  • what are you thinking about right now?
  • who or what are you protecting?
  • what secrets are you currently keeping?
  • what is your hidden pain?
